condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: EBOLA / ENGAGEMENT COMMUNAUTAIRE - PREVENTION ET REPONSE

description.narrative: In 2019, UNICEF co-led the Communication Commission and the Risk Communication and Community Engagement (RCCE) team played an important role in the establishment and reinforcement of 3,266 Community Animation Cells (CAC) in 27 out of 29 health zones in the three provinces of Ituri, South Kivu and North Kivu affected by Ebola Virus Disease (EVD), obtaining 108% of the target number of CACs planned (3,000). | Status:Met | As-of Date:08/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of people at-risk reached through community engagement, advocacy, interpersonal communications, public animations, radio, door-to-door, church meetings, schools, adolescent groups, administrative employees, armed forces.
Number of radio stations broadcasting Ebola messages.

Number of members of influential leaders and groups reached through advocacy, community engagement and interpersonal communication activities (CAC, religious /traditional leaders, opinion leaders, educators, motorists, military, journalists, indigenous group leaders, special populations and adolescents).
Number of frontline workers (RECO) in affected zones mobilized on Ebola response and participatory community engagement approaches.
Number of interactive radios programmes broadcast.

Number of eligible people listed for vaccination informed of the benefits of the vaccine and convinced to receive the vaccine within required protocols (This figure indicates the number of eligible people listed for vaccination from 8 August 2018 to 14 December 2019).
Number of households for which personalized house visits were undertaken to address serious misperception about Ebola, refusals to secure burials or resistance to vaccination.
Number of CACs set up and operational.
